i1.name: Break the Mold
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Rell's''' [[basic attack]]s deal {{as|{{pp|8 to 16}}|magic damage}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and reduce the target's {{sti|armor penetration|{{as|armor}}}} and {{sti|magic penetration|{{as|magic resistance}}}} by 10% for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent attacks against them. Basic attacks against enemy champions will refresh the duration for all nearby afflicted enemies.

'''Rell''' gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' armor}}}} and {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}}}} equal to the sum of the resistances reduced from all afflicted enemies, respectively, and ''Break the Mold's'' '''bonus''' damage is increased equal to the sum of the resistances reduced from the target.
''Break the Mold'' will reduce the target's {{as|armor}} and {{as|magic resistance}} by a minimum of {{pp|5 to 12 for 8|1;3;5;8;10;12;15;17}}, or {{pp|0 to 2 for 3|1;2;13}} versus {{tip|minions}}.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Rell's basic attacks deal 8undefined − 16undefined (based on level) bonus magic damage and reduce the target's armor and magic resistance by 10% for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent attacks against them. Basic attacks against enemy champions will refresh the duration for all nearby afflicted enemies.
Rell gains bonus armor and bonus magic resistance equal to the sum of the resistances reduced from all afflicted enemies, respectively, and Break the Mold's bonus damage is increased equal to the sum of the resistances reduced from the target.
Break the Mold will reduce the target's armor and magic resistance by a minimum of 1;3;5;8;10;12;15;17 ‒ undefined, or 1;2;13 ‒ undefined versus minions.
Rell's attack windup is reduced
i1.notes:
* The resistances are stolen after the damage from the triggering attack is calculated, meaning only subsequent attacks will benefit from the reduction.
* '''Rell's''' [[buff]] accumulates enemies with ''Break the Mold's'' [[debuff]] and she will consequently lose a portion of the bonus resistances gained as afflicted enemies die. This is contrary to other effects described as "thefts" (e.g. {{ai|Seismic Shard|Malphite}} and {{ai|Subjugate|Trundle}}) that are implemented by granting a buff to the caster that is proportionate, though independent, to the debuff applied to the target (i.e. in those instances, each persists for the full duration regardless).

q1.name: Shattering Strike
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rell''' thrusts her lance in the target direction, completely destroying damage-mitigating {{tip|shield|shields}} of enemies hit before dealing them {{as|magic damage}}, reduced to 50% against enemies beyond the first. The first enemy hit is also afflicted with {{ai|Break the Mold|Rell}}.
If '''Rell''' is tethered with {{ai|Attract and Repel|Rell}}, she and the bound ally {{tip|heal}} for each enemy champion hit.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Rell thrusts her lance in the target direction, completely destroying damage-mitigating shields of enemies hit before dealing them magic damage, reduced to 50% against enemies beyond the first. The first enemy hit is also afflicted with Break the Mold.
If Rell is tethered with Attract and Repel, she and the bound ally heal for each enemy champion hit.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|70 to 210}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}|Secondary Damage|{{ap|70*0.5 to 210*0.5}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}}}}
{{st|Heal Per Champion|{{ap|10 to 30}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}} {{as|(+ 5% of '''missing''' health)}}}}
q1.notes:
* ''Shattering Strike'' will cast from wherever '''Rell''' is at the end of the cast time.
* '''Rell''' is {{tip|lockout|locked out}} of moving, attacking, and casting any other ability except {{ai|Attract and Repel|Rell}} for {{fd|0.35}} seconds after ''Shattering Strike'' is cast.
** Casting {{ai|Attract and Repel|Rell}} will cancel ''Shattering Strike''. The ability will not go on cooldown but will still expend {{as|mana}}.{{bug|2}}
* ''Shattering Strike'', while binded to an ally, will grant the {{tip|heal}} from hitting {{tip|clone|clones}} as well.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 50% AP)
  • Secondary Damage: (+ 25% AP)
• Heal Per Champion: (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% of missing health)

e1.name: Attract and Repel
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Rell''' forms a {{tip|tether}} between her and the ally bound by ''Attract and Repel'', granting the ally {{as|10% of her '''total''' armor}} and {{as|10% of her '''total''' magic resistance}} while they are nearby.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Rell''' magnetically binds herself and the allied champion nearest to the cursor with ''Attract and Repel''. '''Rell''' can then recast ''Attract and Repel'' while the tether persists.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Rell''' erupts the tether, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to and {{tip|stun|stunning}} all enemies between and around her and the bound ally for {{fd|0.5}} seconds.

'''Rell''' can [[Unit-targeted|self-target]] to dispel the current bind if she has not casted an [[champion ability|ability]] nor taken damage from or attacked enemy champions within the last 3 seconds. Only one ally can be bound at a time, and selecting a new ally overrides the previous bind.
''Attract and Repel'' will incur a {{fd|2.75}}-second {{sti|cooldown}} with no cost if '''Rell''' binds to an ally and a 1-second {{sti|cooldown}} with no cost if she self-targets.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Rell forms a tether between her and the ally bound by Attract and Repel, granting the ally 10% of her total armor and 10% of her total magic resistance while they are nearby.
Active: Rell magnetically binds herself and the allied champion nearest to the cursor with Attract and Repel. Rell can then recast Attract and Repel while the tether persists.
Recast: Rell erupts the tether, dealing magic damage to and stunning all enemies between and around her and the bound ally for 0.5 seconds.
Rell can Unit-targeted to dispel the current bind if she has not casted an champion ability nor taken damage from or attacked enemy champions within the last 3 seconds. Only one ally can be bound at a time, and selecting a new ally overrides the previous bind.
Attract and Repel will incur a 2.75-second cooldown with no cost if Rell binds to an ally and a 1-second cooldown with no cost if she self-targets.
e1.notes: * The effects render before the cast time. * All units can see the effective area of the tether. Both conduits can see the tether range when within 600 units of it. ** '''Rell''' has an arrow indicator that points to the other conduit. Depending on the distance it glows blue (0–900), yellow (900–2020), and red (2020+). * ''Attract and Repel'' will be placed on a very short cooldown (less than {{fd|0.1}} seconds) when the tether is reapplied to the bound ally after the two become in tether range again.

r1.name: Magnet Storm
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rell''' erupts with magnetic fury, {{tip|airborne|pulling}} all nearby enemies {{tt|towards her|to a ring 225 units around Rell, but minimum 100 pull distance}} and creating a field of gravitational force around her for the next 2 seconds that deals {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.25}} seconds to nearby enemies and continuously {{tip|kinematics|drags}} them towards her.
r1.descriptionHtml: Active: Rell erupts with magnetic fury, pulling all nearby enemies towards her and creating a field of gravitational force around her for the next 2 seconds that deals magic damage every 0.25 seconds to nearby enemies and continuously drags them towards her.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage Per Tick|{{ap|15 to 35}} {{as|(+ {{fd|13.75}}% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage Per Target|{{ap|120 to 280}} {{as|(+ 110% AP)}}}}
r1.notes:
* ''Magnet Storm'' will cast from wherever '''Rell''' is at the end of the cast time.
* Enemies that leave the field can still be dragged after entering the corresponding area again.
* ''Magnet Storm'' will '''not''' drag units that are:
** {{tip|Dash|Dashing}}.
** Being displaced (e.g. by {{tip|airborne}} effects or via abilities such as {{ai|Impale|Skarner}}).
** {{tip|Attach|Attached}}.
** {{tip|Displacement immune|Displacement immune}}.
** {{tip|cc-immune|Immune to crowd control}}.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the initial {{tip|airborne|pull}} but not the dragging effect.
* ''Magnet Storm'' will cancel if '''Rell''' casts {{ai|Attract and Repel|Rell}} during the cast time.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage Per Tick: (+ 13.75% AP)
  • Total Magic Damage Per Target: (+ 110% AP)
